projects.name: Product 1
projects.title: Bull's Call
projects.info: How to earn money by predicting the price of crypto ?
projects.description: By predicting price of the crypto either going up or down, players can earn more crypto.Companies recruiting individuals save their time verifying documents.

projects.name: Product 2
projects.title: Medi_chain
projects.info: How to store patient records which is tamper-proof and easy to access?
projects.description: Medical records can be viewed and edited. Doctors can access patient details with ease, data won't get hacked or lost. The underlying technology is Blockchain IPFS which stores all personal details and health records.

projects.name: Product 2
projects.title: Document_verification
projects.info: How to check the integrity of an individual's documents?
projects.description: Documents of individuals get uploaded in IPFS and their details are stored in the blockchain. Verifier verify those documents based on duplicity and misinformation.There is no maximum limit for winning reward.

process.title: Requirement
process.description: We follow the first and foremost priority of gathering requirements, resources, and information to begin our project.

process.title: UI/UX Design
process.description: We create catchy and charming designs with the latest tools of designing to make it a best user-friendly experience.

process.title: Prototype
process.description: After designing, you will get your prototype, which will be sent ahead for the development process for the product.

process.title: Development
process.description: Development of mobile application/web/blockchain started using latest tools and technologies with transparency.

process.title: Quality Assurance
process.description: Hyperlink values quality and provides 100% bug-free application with no compromisation in it.

process.title: Deployment
process.description: After trial and following all processes, your app is ready to launch on the App store or Play Store.

process.title: Support
process.description: Our company offers you all support and the team is answerable to every query after deployment.
